articles.description: Sam's health declined while on a family holiday three years ago, Warwick revealed.
articles.content:
ITV Tenable star Warwick Davis has broken his silence on his wife's mystery illness - saying he gathered his kids at hospital to say goodbye. Warwick says he broke down in tears daily.

articles.author: Nathan Rowe
articles.title: TV legend Bob Warman's last day at ITV Central today as news anchor steps down - Express & Star
articles.description: One of the region’s longest-serving TV stars will stand down today after nearly half a century on our screens.
articles.content:
Bob Warman, presenter for ITVs Centrals flagship evening news programme, announced he was calling it a day after 49 years back in April.
During that time the 75-year-old, who was born in Walsall, ha… [+2020 chars]

articles.content:

articles.title: Travis Scott is seen in Miami ahead of performance... after first fest since Astroworld is canceled - Daily Mail
articles.description: Travis Scott hung out with friends in Miami on Saturday before his performance at E11even night club. The rapper wore a monochrome green outfit as he relaxed on South Beach.
